overview:
Business Development at Abpro

Abpro that specializes in generating custom monoclonal antibodies. Our company; however, works differently than others. The foundation of our technology is the HTP mouse. Our proprietary HTP mouse has been genetically engineered to have a boosted immune system to circumvent the short comings of the industryâ€™s standard BALB/c mouse, enabling us to offer customers unique advantages.

Primarily, we can deliver our clients a more diverse group of antibodies to more epitopes on a given antigen. Our technology has been proven to make antibodies to epitopes which conventional systems have failed.

In addition, our HTP mouse can go through immunization rapidly, enabling us to deliver custom made monoclonal hybridomas in 2 months; saving time and money. Our revolutionary technology makes us the most rapid high quality monoclonal antibody provider in the world.
